__e: Except, well, I'm sorry to say, but you made light saber noises, and like, the only rule of charades is no noise.
Unless it's with lightsabers. But that's like three to five years away, so...
I realized once I left the precinct how wrong it was for me to sell those lightsabers.
No, no, swords and sorcery, that's more my thing, like, uh, "Lord of the Rings."
Sword fighting is kind of different and looked like good fun and I've been a couple of times and it is good fun.
Once upon a time, I sent five of my best swords out into the world under my own name.
